Class WikipediaWordsRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • WikipediaWordsRunner

  • public class WikipediaWordsRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    WikipediaWords This program creates multiple threads to run the WikipediaWords program.
    Since:
    September 3rd, 2016

      A constructor for WikipediaWords accepting the runTime in seconds, a numThreads to create and whether or not to saveToFile all the results.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WikipediaWordsRunner

        public WikipediaWordsRunner(double runTime,
                            int numThreads,
                            boolean saveToFile,
                            boolean cumulative)
        A constructor for WikipediaWords accepting the runTime in seconds, a numThreads to create and whether or not to saveToFile all the results.
        Parameters:
        runTime - The time in seconds to run the threads for.
        numThreads - The number of threads to create.
        saveToFile - Whether or not to save the results sorted onto files.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the program, creating and starting the threads.

      • DoneParsing

        public void DoneParsing(int articlesParsed)
        Called by individual threads to notify completion of parsing articles (after specified time).
        Parameters:
        articlesParsed - The number of articles successfully parsed by the thread.

      • DoneWriting

        public void DoneWriting()
        Called by individual threads to notify completion of writing the results to a file.

      • saveToCumulativeFile

        private void saveToCumulativeFile()
        Function used to save the results from the lists to a file.

      • saveListToFile

        private void saveListToFile(java.io.BufferedWriter bufferedWriter,
                            WordList wordList)
        Used to save results from a single list to a file.
        Parameters:
        bufferedWriter - The BufferedWriter object used for writing to the list.
        wordList - The WordList object containing the list.

      • saveToFile

        private void saveToFile()
        Saves the results of program execution to files.

      • saveListToOutput

        private void saveListToOutput(java.lang.String filePath,
                              WordList wordList,
                              java.lang.String headingText)
        Used by the saveToFile function to save a single wordList with a specific headingText to a file at a specific filePath.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to where to save the file.
        wordList - A WordList array of words sorted by numOccurrences to save to the file.
        headingText - A line of explanatory text to write to the top of the file.

      • cleanUp

        private void cleanUp()
        Deletes all used temp files in the project.

      • loadResultsFromFiles

        private void loadResultsFromFiles()
        Loads results obtained by WikipediaWordsThreads after they are done saving their results to files. This greatly increases the communication speed for results.

      • loadResultsFromFile

        private void loadResultsFromFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                 boolean overrideList)

      • loadResultFromFile

        private WordList loadResultFromFile(java.io.BufferedReader reader,
                                    WordList wordsList,
                                    boolean overrideList)
        A helper method for loadResultsFromFiles that loads words onto a specific WordList from a BufferedReader reader.
        Parameters:
        reader - A BufferedReader used to load results from a file.
        wordsList - A WordList array of words to save to.

      • printResults

        private void printResults()
        Prints top 10 results for words of all parsed articles.
